dct_title_s: Gold and quicksilver district of California
dct_description_sm: The map derives from that of Ord, which appeared in government document dated Dec. 5, 1848, but has additional material.
Shows topography, drainage, vegeation, roads, mines.
Printed in California Herald, Tuesday, December 26, 1848, New York.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
